title: Managing change
creator_credit: Millbank Films, David Evans and Peter Rawson
brief_description: Follows the disruption created in a factory when a change in methods is not properly explained to the workers. This dramatisation graphically shows how overworked staff and poor communication causes dissatisfaction and interrupts production.
